testcase.classname: Feature to test place order functionality in Flipkart
testcase.name: Validate the place order E2E functionality
testcase.system-out: Given user is on login page.................................................passed When user enters username and password and click on login button............passed Then user search for laptop.................................................passed Then user select the first laptop...........................................passed Then user clicks on add to cart button......................................passed And user clicks logout button...............................................passed
